desc: Show off your USF pride with our new Herd of Thunder merchandise today!

layout.text: The USF Herd of Thunder Athletic Bands aim to provide quality entertainment to a wide variety of audiences; support our athletic teams with pride, perpetual spirit, and integrity; and create a musically enriching and enjoyable experience for every member. Every dollar spent in the HOT Shop will be directly channeled towards the marching band and the students within that make it all possible. We greatly appreciate all of your support and look forward to seeing you at our next performance!
